Articles.Content:
Hey guys, I made a video teaching you how to play multiplayer in KSP, I've been doing this with my friend for months!!!

The written directions i got this from are here:

http://imgur.com/a/0TQmI

The Symbolic Link Creator can be found here

https://code.google.com/p/symlinker/

and Download...

https://code.google.com/p/symlinker/downloads/detail?name=Symlink%20Creator%201.1.1.3.exe&can=2&q=

(NOTE: IT MUST BE RUN IN ADMINISTRATOR MODE)

Dropbox is a free website where you can host your files online

dropbox.com

sign up and share it with your friends and they will have the files locally on their computer

Kerbal Space Program is a great game for space nerds like me

https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/

Again I will reiterate that this is non synchronous multiplayer, but as long as you and your friend(s) are not on at the same time, everything will run smoothly and you won't have to worry about copying and re pasting and re sharing save files.

If you can't understand what I'm saying, here are the steps:

1. Open KSP

2. Create a new save file

3. Exit KSP

4. Go to your KSP saves folder

5. CUT and Paste the save file into dropbox

6. Share the dropbox folder with your friends

7a. Use symlink creator (in admin mode) to create a sybolic link back into your KSP saves folder

7b. Have your friends do the same

8. Play some KSP

9. Let your friend play some KSP cuz ur a nice guy

10. Blowup ur "friend"'s space station
